A Little Bit About Me

I was looking for a new challenge and recieved an opportunity to join the Awesome Inc Bootcamp, diving into the world of web development. It has been exciting and look forward to applying what I learned in the classroom to everyday problems. I bring along transferable experiences in management, customer service and quality control. I enjoy being active in the community, trying new things and watching or competing in several sports.
